argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | 0ghm.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` N ) |
| 2 |  | 0ghm.b | |- B = ( Base ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( M e. Grp -> M e. Mnd ) |
| 4 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( N e. Grp -> N e. Mnd ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_0mhm | |- ( ( M e. Mnd /\ N e. Mnd ) -> ( B X. { .0. } ) e. ( M MndHom N ) ) |
| 6 | 3, 4, 5 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( M e. Grp /\ N e. Grp ) -> ( B X. { .0. } ) e. ( M MndHom N ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_ghmmhmb | |- ( ( M e. Grp /\ N e. Grp ) -> ( M GrpHom N ) = ( M MndHom N ) ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( M e. Grp /\ N e. Grp ) -> ( B X. { .0. } ) e. ( M GrpHom N ) ) |
